definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)
credit hour (in an academic credit system)/see also 學分制|学分制[xue2 fen1 zhi4]

sentences.english: Those who have enrolled in credit-bearing courses offered under CAM will be issued a CAM student identity card.
sentences.chinese: 學分累積制的學員將獲發學生證作辨別身份之用。

sentences.english: They credited me with three hours in history.
sentences.chinese: 他們給了我三小時歷史課的學分。

sentences.english: This is a 60 credit hours program, equivalent to two years of full-time academic studies.
sentences.chinese: 共須修讀六十個學分，相等於兩年全時間的課程。

sentences.english: The main nutritional components of Xingtai chestnut was analyzed with chemical analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學分析法，分析了邢臺板栗的主要營養成分。

sentences.english: Nicki: Duke has offered a credit program since the 1980's .
sentences.chinese: 杜克是從1980年代開始提供這類學分項目的。

sentences.english: Live, work, and earn UNH credits in Washington, DC!
sentences.chinese: 生活，工作，並獲得大學學分。

sentences.english: This is a three-credit course, to be taught in English.
sentences.chinese: 這是一門三個學分的英文課程。

sentences.english: The Credit Class tuition above includes the teaching materials and insurance fee.
sentences.chinese: 學分班以上費用包括補充教材及學生保險費。

sentences.english: Contact your school's guidance office to find out how to apply for credits.
sentences.chinese: 和你學校的指導中心聯繫，詢問該如何申請學分。

sentences.english: The analysis of on-job training investment on the base of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，數學分析角度的在職培訓投資分析。

sentences.english: The aromatic hydrocarbons content in naphtha was analyzed by a chemical reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學分析方法測定了工業用石腦油中芳香烴的含量。

sentences.english: Students can get college credit for such classes.
sentences.chinese: 學生通過參加這些課程可以獲到學分。

sentences.english: Half-life of radioactive element carbon-14 is 5730 year.
sentences.chinese: 用放射性同位素碳14測定有機物年齡的化學分析。

sentences.english: Now he needs only two credit hours to graduate.
sentences.chinese: 現在他只需再修兩個學分就可以畢業了。

sentences.english: If you have to work anyway, why not get credit for it?
sentences.chinese: 反正你也是要工作的，爲什麼不趁此得到學分呢？

sentences.english: The second part is the about the design on moral credit system.
sentences.chinese: 論文的第三部分是德育學分制的實施。

definition: (at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
